name: Speed
description: Gain a 15% speed increase when moving in bushes.

name: Damage
description: Deal 15% extra damage when your Brawler is below 50% Health.

name: Vision
description: Reveal opponents for 2 seconds after dealing damage to them.

name: Shield
description: Gain extra 900 health as a consumable shield. The shield regenerates in 10 seconds, when at full health.

name: Thicc Head
description: Tick’s Super ‘HeadFirst’ gets 1000 more hit points (Tick only).

name: Talk to the Hand
description: Increases Magic Hand range by one Tile (Gene only).

name: Enduring Toxins
description: Increases damage done by poison effects (Crow only).

name: Sticky Spikes
description: Super now slows 30% more effectively (Spike only).

name: Lingering Smoke
description: Increase Super duration by two seconds (Leon only).

name: Exhausting Storm
description: Decreases enemy damage by 20% while in Sandstorm (Sandy only).

name: Sticky Oil
description: Amber’s oil spill now slightly slows enemy Brawlers (Amber only).

name: Pet Power
description: Brawler Pets deal 25% more damage/ healing (Jessie, Nita, Mr. P, Tara, Penny).

name: Quadruplets
description: Eve’s Super now spawns an additional hatchling (Eve only).

name: Super Turret
description: Increases the healing of Pam's Turret by 20% (Pam only).

name: Bat Storm
description: Mortis’ Super projectile speed is increased (Mortis only).
